con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationAPP}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="dd5dbe72-42d8-4a28-a725-5224c185545b"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${Step2_CreateBMBalanceAboveSOCreateWithCrediotrAccBlcoked#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId> <urn1:agreementVersion>${Step2_CreateBMBalanceAboveSOCreateWithCrediotrAccBlcoked#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>APPROVE</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from STO_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${Step2_CreateBMBalanceAboveSOCreateWithCrediotrAccBlcoked#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'

Select TRANSACTIONSID,FK_PAYMENTINFOID,PEPROCESSINGLINE,PAYMENTTYPE,PAYMENTSTATUS,AGREEMENTID,AGREEMENTVERSION,AGREEMENTTYPE,RELEASEDATE,DEBETACCOUNTNO,DEBITAMOUNTAMT,TRANSFER_IN_SAME_BANK from TRANSACTIONS where AGREEMENTID = '${Step2_CreateBMBalanceAboveSOCreateWithCrediotrAccBlcoked#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
